title: Shared Tasks
description: Simple shared task management for couples. No projects, no priorities, no labels. Just tasks, a shared list, and visibility into what's getting done.
overview: Shared task list for couples - add tasks, claim them, mark done, see who did what.
Magic link auth (passwordless) - enter email, click link, you're in.
Household pairing via 6-character invite code - partner joins your shared list.
Done Feed shows completed tasks from last 7 days with attribution.
PWA-ready - add to home screen for native app experience.
Deployed on Render with PostgreSQL backend.

entrypoints.note: React app bootstrap - mounts App to DOM
Root component - auth flow, tab navigation, task/done views
FastAPI server - all API routes, CORS, static file serving

commands.note: Start both frontend (Vite) and backend (uvicorn) together
Frontend only - Vite dev server on :5173
Production build - TypeScript check + Vite bundle

keyFiles.note: Setup guide, API docs, deployment instructions
All API routes: auth, users, households, tasks
Main UI - auth gates, tab nav, state management

diagrams.dataFlow:
graph LR
    subgraph Auth Flow
        A1[User enters email] --> A2[POST /auth/magic-link]
        A2 --> A3[Magic token generated]
        A3 --> A4[User clicks link with token]

        T2 -->|POST /tasks/id/claim| T3[Task Claimed]
        T3 -->|POST /tasks/id/complete| T4[Task Completed]

diagrams.householdFlow:
graph LR
    subgraph Household Pairing

        H2 --> H3[Shares code with User B]

    end
